title: So is the yearly review coming back?
body:
As a a reminder on Facebook, On this day Riot gave us stats that I thought were pretty nice. Most played champions, first Pentakill of the season, Which of your friends you played the game most with. Even a chart that compared our stats to famous pros in our roles. It was something in depth and cool to look at. I remember coming into the new season with more motivation because of said review.

So am I missing it or has Riot said anything about it? It would suck if we're not getting it this year, but i can understand the reasons why.
